20101214181412.000|20101214181414.000|CCO|TO REPORT TODAY.
20101214181414.000|20101214181416.000|CCO|RICHARD HOLBROOKE, LONGTIME U.S.

20101214181418.000|20101214181420.000|CCO|CHIEF ENVOY TO PAKISTAN AND 
20101214181420.000|20101214181422.000|CCO|AFGHANISTAN, PASSED AWAY  
20101214181422.000|20101214181423.667|CCO|YESTERDAY OF COMPLICATIONS FROM 
20101214181423.667|20101214181425.333|CCO|SURGERY TO REPAIR A TORN AORTA. 
20101214181425.333|20101214181427.000|CCO|HE WAS 69.
20101214181427.000|20101214181428.667|CCO|NOW, I ADORED THIS GUY. 
20101214181428.667|20101214181430.333|CCO|I WAS LUCKY ENOUGH -- I ALWAYS

20101214181433.667|20101214181435.333|CCO|FOLKS.
